inclusion.criterion: Outpatients ≥ 20 year of age, male or female with essential hypertension
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be on a stable condition of CAPD for at least 6 months.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute coronary syndrome, stroke, transient ischemic attack, cardiac, carotid or major vascular surgery, percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) or carotid angioplasty, within the past 3 months prior to visit 1.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Coronary or carotid artery disease likely to require surgical or percutaneous intervention within the 6 months after Visit 1.
exclusion.label: triggers
